name: HTTP Request Tool
semantic_context: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data
natural_language_description: 这是 HTTP Request Tool 节点。主要用于: Makes an HTTP request and returns the response data

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to LLM what this tool does, better description would allow LLM to produce expected result
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to LLM what this tool does, better description would allow LLM to produce expected result

method.name: method
method.natural_language_description: 参数名: Method | 默认值: GET

placeholderNotice.displayName: Tip: You can use a {placeholder} for any part of the request to be filled by the model. Provide more context about them in the placeholders section
placeholderNotice.name: placeholderNotice
placeholderNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tip: You can use a {placeholder} for any part of the request to be filled by the model. Provide more context about them in the placeholders section

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.description: Select the type of authentication to use if needed, authentication would be done by n8n and your credentials will not be shared with the LLM
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: Select the type of authentication to use if needed, authentication would be done by n8n and your credentials will not be shared with the LLM | 默认值: none
available_options: Predefined Credential Type (值: predefinedCredentialType) - We've already implemented auth for many services so that you don't have to set it up manually
Generic Credential Type (值: genericCredentialType) - Fully customizable. Choose between basic, header, OAuth2, etc.

nodeCredentialType.name: nodeCredentialType
nodeCredentialType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Credential Type | (必填项)

googleApiWarning.displayName: Make sure you have specified the scope(s) for the Service Account in the credential
googleApiWarning.name: googleApiWarning
googleApiWarning.natural_language_description: 参数名: Make sure you have specified the scope(s) for the Service Account in the credential

genericAuthType.name: genericAuthType
genericAuthType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Generic Auth Type | (必填项)

sendQuery.name: sendQuery
sendQuery.description: Whether the request has query params or not
sendQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Query Parameters | 作用: Whether the request has query params or not | 默认值: False

specifyQuery.name: specifyQuery
specifyQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Query Parameters | 默认值: keypair
available_options: Let Model Specify Entire Body (值: model)

parametersQuery.name: parametersQuery
parametersQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query Parameters | 默认值: {'values': [{'name': ''}]}

jsonQuery.name: jsonQuery
jsonQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON | 提示: Use a {placeholder} for any data to be filled in by the model

sendHeaders.name: sendHeaders
sendHeaders.description: Whether the request has headers or not
sendHeaders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Headers | 作用: Whether the request has headers or not | 默认值: False

specifyHeaders.name: specifyHeaders
specifyHeaders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Headers | 默认值: keypair
available_options: Let Model Specify Entire Body (值: model)

parametersHeaders.name: parametersHeaders
parametersHeaders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Header Parameters | 默认值: {'values': [{'name': ''}]}

jsonHeaders.name: jsonHeaders
jsonHeaders.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON | 提示: Use a {placeholder} for any data to be filled in by the model

sendBody.name: sendBody
sendBody.description: Whether the request has body or not
sendBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send Body | 作用: Whether the request has body or not | 默认值: False

specifyBody.name: specifyBody
specifyBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: Specify Body | 默认值: keypair
available_options: Let Model Specify Entire Body (值: model)

parametersBody.name: parametersBody
parametersBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body Parameters | 默认值: {'values': [{'name': ''}]}

jsonBody.name: jsonBody
jsonBody.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON | 提示: Use a {placeholder} for any data to be filled in by the model

placeholderDefinitions.name: placeholderDefinitions
placeholderDefinitions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Placeholder Definitions | 默认值: []

optimizeResponse.name: optimizeResponse
optimizeResponse.description: Whether the optimize the tool response to reduce amount of data passed to the LLM that could lead to better result and reduce cost
optimizeResponse.natural_language_description: 参数名: Optimize Response | 作用: Whether the optimize the tool response to reduce amount of data passed to the LLM that could lead to better result and reduce cost | 默认值: False

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expected Response Type | 默认值: json

dataField.name: dataField
dataField.description: Specify the name of the field in the response containing the data
dataField.natural_language_description: 参数名: Field Containing Data | 作用: Specify the name of the field in the response containing the data | 提示: leave blank to use whole response

fieldsToInclude.name: fieldsToInclude
fieldsToInclude.description: What fields response object should include
fieldsToInclude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Fields | 作用: What fields response object should include | 默认值: all
available_options: Selected (值: selected) - Include only fields specified below
Except (值: except) - Exclude fields specified below

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Comma-separated list of the field names. Supports dot notation. You can drag the selected fields from the input panel.
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: Comma-separated list of the field names. Supports dot notation. You can drag the selected fields from the input panel.

cssSelector.name: cssSelector
cssSelector.description: Select specific element(e.g. body) or multiple elements(e.g. div) of chosen type in the response HTML.
cssSelector.natural_language_description: 参数名: Selector (CSS) | 作用: Select specific element(e.g. body) or multiple elements(e.g. div) of chosen type in the response HTML. | 默认值: body

onlyContent.name: onlyContent
onlyContent.description: Whether to return only content of html elements, stripping html tags and attributes
onlyContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return Only Content | 作用: Whether to return only content of html elements, stripping html tags and attributes | 提示: Uses less tokens and may be easier for model to understand | 默认值: False

elementsToOmit.name: elementsToOmit
elementsToOmit.description: Comma-separated list of selectors that would be excluded when extracting content
elementsToOmit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Elements To Omit | 作用: Comma-separated list of selectors that would be excluded when extracting content

truncateResponse.name: truncateResponse
truncateResponse.natural_language_description: 参数名: Truncate Response | 提示: Helps save tokens | 默认值: False

maxLength.name: maxLength
maxLength.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Response Characters | 默认值: 1000
